channel.title: Pages on Yao-Jen Kuo
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yao-Jen Kuo

item.title: About me
item.author: tonykuoyj@gmail.com (Yao-Jen Kuo)
item.description: It is nice to meet a ping pong talent(estimated USATT rating: 2,100+), who is also a marathon runner (PR 02:56:04) and a data enthusiast. Data Enthusiast Co-founder of Kyosei.ai(Current) Lecturer at NTU CSIE Training Program(Current) Open Course Developer at DataCamp(Current, Remote) Senior Data Analyst at Coupang(2016) Analytical Consultant at SAS(2013-2016) Management Associate Program at CTBC(2012-2013) Marathon Runner 2-time Boston Marathon Qualifier in 2016, 2017 PR 02:56:04 at 2017 Standard Chartered Marathon in Taipei.

item.title: Projects
item.author: tonykuoyj@gmail.com (Yao-Jen Kuo)
item.description: 著作 輕鬆學習 R 語言 - 紙本書 輕鬆學習 R 語言 - GitBook R 語言使用者的 Python 學習筆記 - iT 邦幫忙 R 語言使用者的 Python 學習筆記 - GitHub 客製課程 Python 與資料科學入門，玉山商業銀行（2017 夏） 台大資工系統訓練班 R 程式設計/R 語言與資料科學應用 Python 與資料科學應用 R 語言與網站爬蟲 SQL 及 R 語言的資料分析實戰
